name: Drone Hunter (Dystopia - Bored Pixels Game Jam)
name_original: Drone Hunter (Dystopia - Bored Pixels Game Jam)
description:
A game where you have your trusty drone,

and you are shooting down delivery and defence drones to make your living.

If your drone dies, the defence drones will kill you before you have a chance to escape.

----------------------------------------

[Controls]

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Fire Primary

Right Click - Fire Secondary

Escape - Menu

----------------------------------------

[Permadeath]
